columns.name: endpoint_identifier
columns.description: The database endpoint identifier.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

columns.name: certificate_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) used for SSL connection to the endpoint.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: The name of the database at the endpoint.

columns.name: endpoint_type
columns.description: The type of endpoint. Valid values are source and target.

columns.name: engine_display_name
columns.description: The expanded name for the engine name. For example, if the EngineName parameter is 'aurora', this value would be 'Amazon Aurora MySQL'.

columns.name: engine_name
columns.description: The database engine name. Valid values, depending on the EndpointType, include 'mysql', 'oracle', 'postgres', 'mariadb', 'aurora', 'aurora-postgresql', 'redshift', 's3', 'db2', 'db2-zos', 'azuredb', 'sybase', 'dynamodb', 'mongodb', 'kinesis', 'kafka', 'elasticsearch', 'documentdb', 'sqlserver', 'neptune', and 'babelfish'.

columns.name: external_id
columns.description: Value returned by a call to CreateEndpoint that can be used for cross-account validation.

columns.name: external_table_definition
columns.description: The external table definition.

columns.name: extra_connection_attributes
columns.description: Additional connection attributes used to connect to the endpoint.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: An KMS key identifier that is used to encrypt the connection parameters for the endpoint.

columns.name: server_name
columns.description: The name of the server at the endpoint.

columns.name: service_access_role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) used by the service to access the IAM role.

columns.name: ssl_mode
columns.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the endpoint. The default value is none.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the endpoint.

columns.name: username
columns.description: The user name used to connect to the endpoint.

columns.name: port
columns.description: The port value used to access the endpoint.

columns.name: dms_transfer_settings
columns.description: The settings for the DMS Transfer type source.

columns.name: doc_db_settings
columns.description: Provides information that defines a DocumentDB endpoint.

columns.name: dynamo_db_settings
columns.description: The settings for the DynamoDB target endpoint.

columns.name: elasticsearch_settings
columns.description: The settings for the OpenSearch source endpoint.

columns.name: gcp_my_sql_settings
columns.description: Settings in JSON format for the source GCP MySQL endpoint.

columns.name: ibm_db2_settings
columns.description: The settings for the IBM Db2 LUW source endpoint.

columns.name: kafka_settings
columns.description: The settings for the Apache Kafka target endpoint.

columns.name: kinesis_settings
columns.description: The settings for the Amazon Kinesis target endpoint.

columns.name: microsoft_sql_server_settings
columns.description: The settings for the Microsoft SQL Server source and target endpoint.

columns.name: mongo_db_settings
columns.description: The settings for the MongoDB source endpoint.

columns.name: my_sql_settings
columns.description: The settings for the MySQL source and target endpoint.

columns.name: neptune_settings
columns.description: The settings for the Amazon Neptune target endpoint.

columns.name: oracle_settings
columns.description: The settings for the Oracle source and target endpoint.

columns.name: postgre_sql_settings
columns.description: The settings for the PostgreSQL source and target endpoint.

columns.name: redis_settings
columns.description: The settings for the Redis target endpoint.

columns.name: redshift_settings
columns.description: Settings for the Amazon Redshift endpoint.

columns.name: s3_settings
columns.description: The settings for the S3 target endpoint.

columns.name: sybase_settings
columns.description: The settings for the SAP ASE source and target endpoint.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags currently associated with the replication instance.
